Riverside at Twin Rivers 2023 Annual Membership Meeting
.entry-header
The Riverside at Twin Rivers HOA Annual Membership Meeting will be held on Wednesday April 19th at 7pm. The meeting will be held at the Seminole Sheriff’s East Region Office at 1225 East Broadway, Oviedo, FL.
.entry-content

Board Members
.entry-header
Steven Freund
President
Tony Velez
Vice President
Phillip Frier
Secretary
Marilyn Dossett
Treasurer
You can contact the Board of Directors by sending an email to
board@riverside-hoa.com
Please note that email messages you send to the Board may be discussed in public at a Board meeting, unless you request that some (or all) information remain private. The Board will do its best to accommodate such privacy requests while still complying with all relevant Florida Statutes.
.entry-content

August 2022 ARC and Board of Directors Meeting
.entry-header
The Riverside at Twin Rivers Community Association Architectural Review Committee and Board of Directors will be holding their next meetings on Wednesday August 17, 2022. The ARC meeting will begin at 6:45pm with the Board of Directors meeting following at 7pm. The meetings will be held at the Seminole County Sheriff’s East Region Office at 1225 East Broadway, Oviedo, FL.
.entry-content

Management Company
.entry-header
Riverside at Twin Rivers is managed by Lighthouse Properties International, LLC (also known as LPI). Our property manager at LPI, Ryan Marrs, is available to assist residents with any questions or concerns via phone or email during normal working hours. Residents also are welcome to contact the Board of Directors with any questions or concerns.
Ryan can be reached by email at
ryanm@towersmgmt.com
or by phone at
1-866-454-4101
. LPI’s mailing address is:
LPI
928 East New Haven Avenue
Melbourne, FL 32901
You can sign in to LPI’s website to check your account balance and view additional resident information. Please contact LPI if you need your account number or password to access your account information.
Website:
http://www.towersmgmt.com/central-florida
.entry-content
